comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: A few years after this photograph was taken, in January 1944, it was reported that a £5 million scheme would be created to revive the woollen industry in Wales The intention was to establish at least 16 new mills once the war was over.
